headline: Does Sempra’s Renewables Push Justify Its Recent 6% Share Price Gain?
summary: Ever wondered whether Sempra could be a hidden value gem worth a closer look? You are not alone if the stock has caught your eye lately. Sempra's share price has nudged up by 0.5% over the past week and is up 6.2% year-to-date. Growth has been more modest at 1.3% over the past year. Most recently, Sempra made headlines by expanding its renewable energy initiatives and securing partnerships to enhance grid resilience. These developments have fueled fresh optimism among investors. These moves...
